dt-example.title: Button Initialisation
dt-example.info:
This is the `-init searchPanes`extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example demonstrates searchPanes being operated using a [Buttons extension](https://datatables.net/extensions/buttons) button. The panes are not visible on initialisation but when the button is pressed they are displayed on the screen and focused on.
The button and SearchPanes can be configured using the `-init button.searchPanes` config option. You can see this in action at [this example](buttonsConfig.html). Please note that when initialising SearchPanes with a button any config has to be set as shown in that example.
